message: Starting analysis of Weeks 1-2 content. Reading PDF text files from pdf-text-extracted/ directory.
Successfully read both PDF text files. Beginning systematic extraction of key concepts, learning objectives, and study material for Weeks 1-2.
Created comprehensive JSON analysis document. Now creating human-readable markdown summary for easier reference.

ANALYSIS COMPLETE for Weeks 1-2. Deliverables: (1) weeks-1-2-content-analysis.json - structured data with 43 key concepts, 20 for Week 1 (Psychology as Science: Wundt, Watson, cognitive revolution, scientific method challenges) and 23 for Week 2 (6 theoretical approaches: Biopsychological, Behaviourist, Psychodynamic, Humanistic, Cognitive, Evolutionary). Documented 10 major studies (Little Albert, Pavlov's dogs, Skinner box, Buss mate preferences), 15 key figures, 14 interdisciplinary applications. (2) weeks-1-2-summary.md - 20-page detailed markdown guide with learning objectives, concept definitions, examples, comparison tables, timeline, and 10 sample quiz questions. Ready for JSON generation phase.
